attributes.additional_details:
We can see the US struggling to make ends meet we have bailed out the Irish government and we see Greece almost at the point of bankruptcy and Italy and Spain as well.
If the Euro zone fails and the US also fails it will bring down the pound there will be total melt down the only country in the world who may not be affected would be China and that could lead to a Chinese domination.

Abolishing Money would be scary, frightening even terrifying but in the long run would be a very good move to the world as a whole…there would be no un-employment there would be on poverty and no corruption almost at a stroke of a pen.
Sign this for a better world to live in, not for us but for our great grand children.
